ygData.subject: Re: Laptops & EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It should work.  The company I work for uses this laptop to demo the PC version of our 3D military sim software while on the road.  Its framerate is not
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, Bob Stewart wrote:
>
> As I type this I'm waiting for Dell to call me back so I can order an
> Inspiron 7500. As far as I can tell it will run EverQuest pretty well. I
> talked to 989 Systems support and was told the ATI Rage Mobility 3D
> hardware in the Dell is sufficient for EverQuest even though they don't
> list it as supported.

It should work. The company I work for uses this laptop to
demo the PC version of our 3D military sim software while on
the road. Its framerate is not spectacular, but should be
more than adequate for playing EQ.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
